name: fast-sha256
description: SHA-256, HMAC and PBKDF2 implementation with typed arrays for modern browsers and Node.js

scripts.build: tsc && echo '});' | cat build/umd-prelude.js build/sha256.js - > sha256.js && rm build/sha256.js && uglifyjs sha256.js -c -m -o sha256.min.js && mv build/sha256.d.ts ./

author: Dmitry Chestnykh
